00023 const char* UTGetErrorString()
00024 {
00025         int errorCode = WSAGetLastError();
00026         switch( errorCode )
00027         {
00028         case WSAEINTR:                  return "WSAEINTR";
00029         case WSAEBADF:                  return "WSAEBADF";
00030         case WSAEACCES:                 return "WSAEACCES";
00031         case WSAEDISCON:                return "WSAEDISCON";
00032         case WSAEFAULT:                 return "WSAEFAULT";
00033         case WSAEINVAL:                 return "WSAEINVAL";
00034         case WSAEMFILE:                 return "WSAEMFILE";
00035         case WSAEWOULDBLOCK:    return "WSAEWOULDBLOCK";
00036         case WSAEINPROGRESS:    return "WSAEINPROGRESS";
00037         case WSAEALREADY:               return "WSAEALREADY";
00038         case WSAENOTSOCK:               return "WSAENOTSOCK";
00039         case WSAEDESTADDRREQ:   return "WSAEDESTADDRREQ";
00040         case WSAEMSGSIZE:               return "WSAEMSGSIZE";
00041         case WSAEPROTOTYPE:             return "WSAEPROTOTYPE";
00042         case WSAENOPROTOOPT:    return "WSAENOPROTOOPT";
00043         case WSAEPROTONOSUPPORT: return "WSAEPROTONOSUPPORT";
00044         case WSAESOCKTNOSUPPORT: return "WSAESOCKTNOSUPPORT";
00045         case WSAEOPNOTSUPP:             return "WSAEOPNOTSUPP";
00046         case WSAEPFNOSUPPORT:   return "WSAEPFNOSUPPORT";
00047         case WSAEAFNOSUPPORT:   return "WSAEAFNOSUPPORT";
00048         case WSAEADDRINUSE:             return "WSAEADDRINUSE";
00049         case WSAEADDRNOTAVAIL:  return "WSAEADDRNOTAVAIL";
00050         case WSAENETDOWN:               return "WSAENETDOWN";
00051         case WSAENETUNREACH:    return "WSAENETUNREACH";
00052         case WSAENETRESET:              return "WSAENETRESET";
00053         case WSAECONNABORTED:   return "WSWSAECONNABORTEDAEINTR";
00054         case WSAECONNRESET:             return "WSAECONNRESET";
00055         case WSAENOBUFS:                return "WSAENOBUFS";
00056         case WSAEISCONN:                return "WSAEISCONN";
00057         case WSAENOTCONN:               return "WSAENOTCONN";
00058         case WSAESHUTDOWN:              return "WSAESHUTDOWN";
00059         case WSAETOOMANYREFS:   return "WSAETOOMANYREFS";
00060         case WSAETIMEDOUT:              return "WSAETIMEDOUT";
00061         case WSAECONNREFUSED:   return "WSAECONNREFUSED";
00062         case WSAELOOP:                  return "WSAELOOP";
00063         case WSAENAMETOOLONG:   return "WSAENAMETOOLONG";
00064         case WSAEHOSTDOWN:              return "WSAEHOSTDOWN";
00065         case WSASYSNOTREADY:    return "WSASYSNOTREADY";
00066         case WSAVERNOTSUPPORTED: return "WSAVERNOTSUPPORTED";
00067         case WSANOTINITIALISED: return "WSANOTINITIALISED";
00068         case WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND: return "WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND";
00069         case WSATRY_AGAIN:              return "WSATRY_AGAIN";
00070         case WSANO_RECOVERY:    return "WSANO_RECOVERY";
00071         case WSANO_DATA:                return "WSANO_DATA";
00072         default: return "NO ERROR";
00073         }
00074 }

00076 //----------------------------------------------------------
00077 hostent* UTResolveHostAddress( const char* address )
00078 {
00080         char hostname[ 256 ];
00081         if ( !address || strlen( address ) == 0 ||
00082                  _stricmp( address, "localhost" ) == 0 || strcmp( address, "127.0.0.1" ) == 0 )
00083         {
00084                 if ( gethostname( hostname, 256 ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00085                 {
00086                         PrintF( "Error getting local host name: %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00087                         return 0;
00088                 }
00089                 address = hostname;
00090         }
00091 
00093         hostent* intHost = 0;
00094         if ( !isalpha( *address ) )
00095         {
00097                 unsigned int addrLen = ( unsigned int )strlen( address );
00098                 if ( addrLen < 16 )
00099                         intHost = gethostbyaddr( address, addrLen, AF_INET );
00100                 else
00101                 {
00102                         PrintF( "Invalid IP address specified!\n" );
00103                         return 0;
00104                 }
00105         }
00106         else
00107         {
00109                 intHost = gethostbyname( address );
00110         }
00111 
00113         if ( !intHost )
00114                 PrintF( "Error resolving host name: %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00115 
00117         return intHost;
00118 }

00120 //----------------------------------------------------------
00121 void UTMakeSockAddr( sockaddr_in* addr, unsigned long ip, unsigned short port )
00122 {
00124         addr->sin_family = AF_INET;
00125         addr->sin_addr.s_addr = ip;
00126         addr->sin_port = htons( port );
00127 }

00129 //----------------------------------------------------------
00130 bool UTSetSocketAsync( SOCKET socket, bool async )
00131 {
00132         unsigned long noBlock = async ? 1 : 0;
00133         if ( ioctlsocket( socket, FIONBIO, &noBlock ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00134         {
00135                 PrintF( "Unable to make socket nonblocking: %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00136                 return false;
00137         }
00138 
00140         return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 //----------------------------------------------------------
00144 bool UTSetSocketBuffered( SOCKET socket, bool buffered )
00145 {
00147         BOOL bOptVal = buffered ? FALSE : TRUE;
00148         int retval = setsockopt( socket, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY,
00149                 ( const char* )&bOptVal, sizeof( bOptVal ) );
00150 
00152         if ( retval == SOCKET_ERROR )
00153         {
00154                 PrintF( "Unable to change socket buffering status: %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00155                 return false;
00156         }
00157 
00158 //      retval = setsockopt( socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_DONTROUTE,
00159 //              ( const char* )&bOptVal, sizeof( bOptVal ) );
00160 
00162 //      unsigned int bufSize = 1024;
00163 //      retval = setsockopt( socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_KEEPALIVE,
00164 //              ( const char* )&bOptVal, sizeof( bOptVal ) );
00165 
00167         return true;
00168 }
